---
id: get-white-board-room-auth
title: "GetWhiteboardRoomAuth"
description: "Call this API to query the default whiteboard permissions of a room."
api: 
info_path: extended_services/super_board/en/server/open-api-desc
---

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>GetWhiteboardRoomAuth</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/"}></MethodEndpoint>


Call this API to query the default whiteboard permissions of a room.

<Note title="Note">Rate limit\: 50 requests/second (Test environment\: 1 request/second).</Note>

## Request

Application ID, assigned by ZEGOCLOUD. className={"openapi-schema__property"}>Data</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div className={"schema-description-container"}><div className={"schema-description"}>If Data is empty, it means no whiteboard permissions have been set for this room.</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"RoomId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Room ID.","example":"RoomName"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ModuleAuth"} required={false} schemaName={"integer[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `1`, `2`]"} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Whiteboard operation permission set.\n- 0\\: No permission\n- 1\\: Allow zooming the whiteboard\n- 2\\: Allow scrolling the whiteboard\n","items":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,1,2]},"example":[1,2]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"GraphicAuth"} required={false} schemaName={"integer[]"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`0`, `2`, `4`, `8`, `16`, `32`]"} schema={{"type":"array","description":"Graphic element operation permission set.\n- 0\\: No operation permission\n- 2\\: Allow modifying graphic elements created by others\n- 4\\: Allow erasing graphic elements created by others\n- 8\\: Allow moving graphic elements created by others\n- 16\\: Allow clearing graphic elements\n- 32\\: Allow creating graphic elements\n","items":{"type":"integer","enum":[0,2,4,8,16,32]},"example":[32,2]}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"}
